channel.title: About the To Do List | Statistical Methods I

item.title: Bivariate Tables
item.description:
• What to do for Week 10 after class ends
  • What to do for Week 12 before coming to class

What to do for Week 10 after class ends

Submit Description Location
Review the solution set from the Chapter 8 homework set Link
Download a copy of the R walkthrough on the t.test Link
Download a copy of the R bonus walkthrough on the compareGroups Link
Complete problems 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 in Chapter 9 Link1
Continue the Foundations of Inference Link
Begin or continue the first optional extra credit module Analyzing Survey Data in R Link
Begin or continue the second optional extra credit module Fundamentals of Bayesian Data Analysis in R Link
Begin or continue the third optional extra credit module Reporting with R Markdown Link


What to do for Week 12 before coming to class2

Area Description Location
Study for your one and only Quiz! Link
Download and read the article Do Colleges Get What They Pay For? Evidence on Football Coach Pay and Team Performance Link

  2. For preparation.↩︎
